price: Nokorε sε, yɛagye yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn no adi sεdeε Ɔde yεn mfomsoͻ bεkyε yεn, ne ntafowa yie a wohyεε yεn wͻ ho no. Nyankopͻn na ͻyε (kyεn wo Farao wͻ akatua pa mu) na (N’asotwee nso na) εwͻ hͻ daa”.
arabic: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغۡفِرَ لَنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَا وَمَآ أَكۡرَهۡتَنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحۡرِۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā āmannā birabbinā liyaghfira lanā khaṭāyānā wamā akrahtanā ʿalayhi mina al-siḥ'ri wal-lahu khayrun wa-abqā
